forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: pasting rgb color

comments.text: you can ctrl+v any clipboard color in the format "255,0,0", meaning red, green, blue from 0-255, while the colors & material dialog is open.
while that dialog is open, you can also hit ctrl+c to copy the currently picked color back to your windows clipboard.
the details of this are also shown again on the back of the colors & material dialog.

thread.latestCommentText: the details of this are also shown again on the back of the colors & material dialog.
